values:
Yeah ... so today is September 3rd ... and that means that yesterday was ...


MY BIRTHDAYYY ... and I LOVE MY FRIENDS ... yesterday was amazing  , I love u Hasya Devon Raquel April and Sarai you make my life complete ... ♥ 

The festivities actually started on Thursday night at Hasya's ... and then they ended pretty quickly for me haha while everyone else was getting crunk ... I was sadly passed out :-( but hey it's all good Hasya took good care of meeee :-) THEN ... on friday ... we went to the "beach" meaning ... HURRICAN HARBOR haha that was loads of fun , we caught some mad air on some of the slides , it was outta control. And on the ride home we got harassed by an athletic team , and there was a lot of licking windows coming from them and it was pretty ... uhh disturbing. " I swear when I listen to the faint it makes me want to take off all my clothes " ahhh gotta love Hasya . But lastnight really made me see why I love all my friends soo much . God damn , I fucking love my boys . Andrew David Robert and Max you guys suprised me like no other I am so happy that you guys came . 

Devon devon devon ... duude you are my bestie wifey sistaaaaaaaaaaa lova. You made all of this this possible , you make me soo happy . I love u forever . ♥ ♥ ♥ Lastnight was amazing :-)

<33 ♥ <3 ♥ ♥ ♥ <33 ♥ ♥ <3 ♥ <33

man o man ... sweeeeeeeeeeet 16 ... 2 days :-)


sooo excited , love love L♥OVE my girls ... devon hasya april vida raquel sarai ... WA♥WA

RA ... back in action !!

wow that was just a little bit lame ... anywho , I am excited for school .

sooo I am back in LA ... and the first thing I see when I get off the plane is a black lady with no teeth that was probably crazy yelling at one of the bag boys at the air port . it was pretty sick .

I realized that I never update my livejournal , I also realized that ...

Liking someone who lives far away hurts like a bitch .

I miss Hasya Sarai Raquel Danielle Devon and Vida ... oo and Karl and Mark ...

soo anywho ... Nantucket was really good and really sad ... got some free rides from Mark karl and vida ... hmm and thats all I can really think of right now . 


sooo comment please. ♥

So ... it has been awhile since I have talked about Mark or Karl on this old thang ... ** BUT **

...in 2 days ... Vida and I are going to good ol' Nantuckettyyyy tuck tuck tuck ... 


♥ SO YEAH ♥


... Thats all I really have to say :-) 

tee hee ... see you in 13 days <33

Today ... was a warm cloudy crazy fun musical yummy spontanious day ...


... just how I like em . 


I am ready for summer , I am ready to travel . LA is boring . I am ready for a road trip with my girls <3


♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥

if I could bring two of my friends together that don't know one another I would chose ....

 

 

Chai y Deeds porque ... they are two of the most amazing people I have ever met and are soooo similar it is scary ... they are also the 2 people I miss the mostest :-(

 

<33

Devon and I agree that we both need anger managment .


I feel a preeching post coming on ...


... Life is life . People chose to live their lives in many different ways , and who are other people to tell them what to do ?? Right ... ? I dunno man , some people do stupid shit , and they usually get what they deserve, but sometimes they don't . So let that rest on their sholders . Everyone gets whats coming to them  in one way or another . 


Chill the fuck out muthafuckaaaaas . <3 peace and love ♥

everyday should be a Topanga Day ... they are the best !!

 

 

This Topanga Days was by far the best ever ... I love seeing people there that you never really get to see other wise .  I saw Hanz and Jesse and Franscis and Sebastion and Nana ... it was all good fun . :-)  I saw Devon belly dance and I am soo proud of her ... love you dev A+ ... but the one person that I saw this weekend who made my whole Topanga Days complete was Danielle .. my little deeds :-) I love you so much and I am sorry I didn'y get to see you before you left today :-(

 

Well all in all ... I love my friends . Oh so much <33 Paz <3

BOYS NIGHT OUT ...

 

always and forever <3

The only thing worse than getting busted by the cops is getting busted by your mother ... mother fucker .

 

 

photo shoot for Hello Kitty tomarrow with my girliessss <33 love you guys *.*.*.* paz <3

drum circle ...sunday . gooo ... <3

I love you ...

Devon Vida Hasya April Sarai Raquel Nora and some of them boyzzz ... <3

I have never had so many bruises in my life, it's scary . I have fallen so many times in the past 2 days it is un beliveable :-(

anywho ... lastnight at Hasya's was fun I wuv you April Devon and Hasya !!! soo sweeeet . Hasya April Jordan Billy and Alex went to <b> drum circle <b> and it was soooo much fun . Some guy started shaking his maraca at Hasya and I when we were dancing . Ooo Oooo and I love the crazy bums that we saw ... soo sweet . I jsut wish Devon had been there, she and I have been living our dreams lately ... ♥ 


... " get offa me !! I gotta kiss my women !! " 


BTJ.out. 40S4L

... it started out nice , then by lunch it got bad/sad. 

anywho ... all in all ...


I wuv my friends ♥ ♥ sooo much ♥ ♥

In a beautiful pea-green boat:
They took some honey,
and plenty of money
Wrapped up in a five-pound note
 DistantHaz3 [8:47 PM]:  The Owl looked up to the stars above,
And sang to a small guitar,
"O lovely Pussy, O Pussy, my love,
What a beautiful Pussy you are,
You are,
You are!
What a beautiful Pussy you are!"
 DistantHaz3 [8:47 PM]:  Pussy said to the Owl, "You elegant fowl,
How charmingly sweet you sing!
Oh! let us be married;
too long we have tarried:
But what shall we do for a ring?"
They sailed away, for a year and a day,
To the land where the bong-tree grows;
And there in a wood a Piggy-wig stood,
With a ring at the end of his nose,
His nose,
His nose,
With a ring at the end of his nose.
 DistantHaz3 [8:47 PM]:  "Dear Pig, are you willing to sell for one shilling
Your ring?" Said the Piggy, "I will."
So they took it away, and were married next day
By the Turkey who lives on the hill.
They dined on mince and slices of quince,
Which they ate with a runcible spoon;

 DistantHaz3 [8:48 PM]:  And hand in hand on the edge of the sand
They danced by the light of the moon,
The moon,
The moon,
They danced by the light of the moon.

I see you... ♥

God damn. I hate fucking livejournal drama.

So maybe when some of your people are feeling the  need to look at my livejournal and tell you my thoughts and feelings, they can copy and paste this little note to you :-)

Dear Alex Wagner,


I don't want shit between us either, and I'm sorry that you thought I was being rude. I guess I seem to forget that the internet has the power to connect everyone, even when 2 people are 2000 miles away. 


♥ paz ♥

I hate when you try to ignore someone and not solve a problem that you have with him/her. and then 4 months later they contact you and your heart falls into the pit of your stomach because you realize all the old feelings that went along with that person.

I hate not being able to share more memories with you . I hate feeling like this is pathetic.

C*O*A*C*H*E*L*L*A ... <3

 

This weekend was the most fun I have had in so long. Palm Springs kicks ass ...

I love Devon Hasya and Raquel, thanks for going crazy with me  ... oo I wuv you :-)  We Saw Immortal Technique, Rilo Kiley, WEEZER!!, Gang of Four, ASP rock, British Sea Power and  The Faint !!!!! that was life changing.

... Well toodles ya'll . <3 I'm tired , and tannn :-) PAZ <3

...>>....<<...♥>><33 *.*.*.*.* 

Tell me your favorite memory that you share with me ...

... I'm gonna feel like a nerd if no one does this. Oh well , I like to live on the edge.

I cut my hair. I like it, lots. 

... Lastnight we went to go see Amir play in the valley with Hasya April Cheyne Miles Devon and Raquel. They were really good. Like REALLY. 

I went to the flea market today with my mother. It was alright, not that much good stuff. 


♥ paz ♥

Today was Devon's sweet 16 ...

... it was ultra chic. 

We went to Westwood and had sushi and met up with Andrew Sarai Rodolfo Robert Henry James Dylan and then 2 of Dylan's friends who got us in to the hookah bar called Gypsy ... it was really nice there. Better than Habibi's ... stupid stupid Habibi's :-)

Then we spent a while walking around trying to find some stuff to ... do ?? Everyone was dry :-( anywho ! who needs drugs?? not usss we made out own fun !! Raquel and I went to The Rocky Mountain Chocolate Factory and Raquel baught a bunch of sweeeets. 

... no 40z today. Maybe tomarrow, I like to live my life by ear. Thats all.

♥ ♥ ♥ HAPPY BIRTHDAY DEV ... LOVE U ♥ ♥ ♥

paz.

TODAY WAS NICE :-)

Devon came to water color with me today, and we did some serious painting in there. My teacher didn't even notice until we were cleaning up and then she was like " hey, your not in this class are you " and Devon in her sweet sweet voice was like " oh yeah, I am in uh directed study and they like don't take attendence" haha I love you Devon, I never work that well. You are my MUSE <3

Then Devon and I didn't go to last period and we hung out in the village and then Devon got picked up and I went with Liss and her friend Brook and this guy Alex. It was a lot of fun. 

Anywho :-) ♥ :-) ♥ PAZ <3

School was quite uneventful...

For some reason I keep thinking about Andrews birthday and a certain someone dancing to gangsta rap ... don't choke yourself bud . I am really laughing. HARD>>><3 Face it boo do it till yo face turns blue. wow. I'm sorry. 


♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥
